      • mainMenuPrompt

        private static User mainMenuPrompt​(Bank theBank,
                                   java.util.Scanner scanner)
        This method is responsible for user's logging in to a bank system process.
        Parameters:
        theBank - A bank the user tries to log in to.
        scanner - A stream in which a user enters data and the bank system sends its responses.
        Returns:
        An already logged in bank system user.

      • printUserMenu

        private static void printUserMenu​(User theUser,
                                  java.util.Scanner scanner)
        TODO: for each bank operation 1-5 ask the user whether he wants to exit from this operation after a failed trial. TODO: Also don't write "Welcome [name]" every time. This method is responsible for making bank operations declared by a bank system user.
        Parameters:
        theUser - A user who makes bank operations.
        scanner - A stream in which a user enters data and the bank system sends its responses.

      • transferFunds

        private static void transferFunds​(User theUser,
                                  java.util.Scanner scanner)
        This method transfer funds from a given account to another one. Both accounts belongs to the same user.
        Parameters:
        theUser - A user who makes a transfer of funds.
        scanner - A stream in which a user enters data and the bank system sends its responses.

      • depositFunds

        private static void depositFunds​(User theUser,
                                 java.util.Scanner scanner)
        This method makes a deposit of funds to a chosen user's bank account.
        Parameters:
        theUser - A user who makes a deposit of funds.
        scanner - A stream in which a user enters data and the bank system sends its responses.

      • withdrawFunds

        private static void withdrawFunds​(User theUser,
                                  java.util.Scanner scanner)
        This method allows a user to withdraw funds from his chosen bank account.
        Parameters:
        theUser - A user who makes a withdrawal of funds from his chosen bank account.
        scanner - A stream in which a user enters data and the bank system sends its responses.

      • showTransactionsHistory

        private static void showTransactionsHistory​(User theUser,
                                            java.util.Scanner scanner)
        This method prints an information about all transactions connected with a given user's account.
        Parameters:
        theUser - A user whom a transaction history of a his chosen account is shown.
        scanner - A stream in which a user enters data and the bank system sends its responses.
